text: Elora Gohor is a Bangladeshi film and television actress. She won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Child Artist for the film Surja Dighal Bari (1979). ==Selected films and drama== * Surja Dighal Bari - 1979 * Gangchil - 1980 * Naat Bou - 1982 * Choruivati - 2002 * Bachelor - 2004 * Chicken Tikka Masala - 2010 * Madhumati - 2011 * Chabial Reunion - 2017 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !!
